messages.message:
Once you’ve created a chatbot, you can’t rename it which is a shame.
It means you have to delete it and start again, as you’d expect the Chatbot share URL break. But we might want to have smoother feedback mechanism to the chatbot users - at the moment:
• It’s takes a long time to load and fail.
• there’s a number of warning messages.
• `Back to AI Hub` - it’s possible that a chatbot creator will want to customise that button to kick the user back to where they were before they opened chatbot. (there might be a scenario where a user doesn’t know what AI Hub is)

• Agree about renaming the chatbot, we are tracking this
• Re: the error when you try to access a deleted chatbot via URL, we handle this much better in 24.20
